Activator.sentence: Activation function used in the network

ApplyClahe.sentence: Apply Contrast limited adaptive histogram equivalent

BatchSize.sentence: Minibatch size (Larger batchsize tends to get better results)

Class1Weight.sentence: Class1 weight (Only used when the Weighted Cross Entropy Loss function is selected)

Class2Weight.sentence: Class2 weight (Only used when the Weighted Cross Entropy Loss function is selected)

Class3Weight.sentence: Class3 weight (Only used when the Weighted Cross Entropy Loss function is selected)

Class4Weight.sentence: Class4 weight (Only used when the Weighted Cross Entropy Loss function is selected)

Class5Weight.sentence: Class5 weight (Only used when the Weighted Cross Entropy Loss function is selected)

EpochNum.sentence: The number of epochs (How many times AI learns whole dataset)

FinalLearningRate.sentence: Final learning rate (only used by AdaBound optimizer)

InitialModelPath.sentence: Initial Model Path (For transfer learning and continuous learning)

MiddleLayerNum.sentence: The number of middle layers in the network

MiddleLayerScale.sentence: The scale of middle layers in the network to original size

Normalizer.sentence: Normalization method used in the network

OutputGraphAndLog.sentence: Output the graph and log of learning process

OutputGraphAndLogInterval.sentence: The number of epochs per the graph and log output

OutputImage.sentence: Output test results with learned parameters of the current epoch

OutputImageInterval.sentence: The number of epochs per image output

OverSampling.sentence: Duplicate images containing a lot of "important" class objects

SchedularStepRate.sentence: Each step, learning rate is updated by following formular (Learning rate * Step rate)

SchedularStepSize.sentence: The number of epochs per learning rate update

SetClassInfoAutomatically.sentence: Get class information from feeded labels

TakeSnapshot.sentence: Output learned model parameters on the specified interval

TakeSnapshotInterval.sentence: The number of epochs per learned model parameters output

ValidationRatio.sentence: The ratio of images used for validation
